short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Google Chrome extension delivers the latest news directly to your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the convenience of a digital newspaper right in your browser! Keep yourself informed effortlessly with the freshest news at a single click. Obtain your essential API key from: https://newsapi.org/register
